title: Proactive License Optimization & Training Program
description: Customer currently has 850 active licenses but only 620 are being utilized regularly (73% utilization). Implement a quarterly business review cadence to optimize license allocation and provide advanced training to underutilized departments. This will increase perceived value and justify renewal at current ARR levels.

title: Early Renewal Incentive with Multi-Year Commitment
description: Renewal is 127 days away. Offer 12% discount on a 3-year commitment if signed 90 days early. This locks in revenue, improves cash flow, and reduces churn risk during their upcoming digital transformation project where competitive solutions may be evaluated.

title: Address Network Latency Pain Point
description: Intelligence reports indicate ongoing frustration with network latency in EMEA regions. Engineering has identified a configuration optimization that can reduce latency by 40%. Schedule immediate technical review with CTO office to implement fix and restore confidence.

title: Upsell Advanced Analytics Module
description: Customer recently hired VP of Data Analytics who is evaluating solutions. Our Advanced Analytics module addresses 4 of their 5 stated use cases. Position this as a strategic capability gap and bundle with renewal for incremental ARR.
